  [94mâ”‚[0m 2. **Core Rules** - Publisher profile and primary voice/style rules

  [94mâ”‚[0m Let me check what you currently have:
  [94mâ””â”€[0m

  [94mâ”Œâ”€ ğŸ¤– AGENT MESSAGE[0m

  [94mâ”‚[0m 
  [94mâ”‚[0m ### Foundation Setup Options
  [94mâ”‚[0m 
  [94mâ”‚[0m For a positioning project about technical blog posts, you have a few options:
  [94mâ”‚[0m 
  [94mâ”‚[0m **Option A: Skip Foundation (Quick Start)**
  [94mâ”‚[0m - Proceed without organizational foundation
  [94mâ”‚[0m - Add sources and extract rules later as needed
  [94mâ”‚[0m - Good for: Testing, small projects, or when you have specific sources in mind
  [94mâ”‚[0m 
  [94mâ”‚[0m **Option B: Build Foundation Now**
  [94mâ”‚[0m - Add web content to `/sources/` (existing blog posts, documentation, style guides)
  [94mâ”‚[0m - Extract core rules (publisher profile, primary voice)
  [94mâ”‚[0m - Good for: Ensuring consistency across multiple projects
  [94mâ”‚[0m 
  [94mâ”‚[0m **What would you like to do?**
  [94mâ”‚[0m 1. Skip foundation setup for now (proceed to project-specific sources)
  [94mâ”‚[0m 2. Build foundation now (I'll guide you through adding content and extracting rules)
  [94mâ”‚[0m 
  [94mâ”‚[0m Type 1 or 2 to continue.

  [94mâ”‚[0m - **Style rules**: Writing style, tone, terminology
